summary: It happened in the sixties, during the political thaw in the Soviet Union... but our story unfolds in the coldest terrain of the country. It was an unexplored and unbeaten terrain of ... See full summary Â»
cast: Konstantin Lavronenko|Grigoriy Dobrygin|Egor Beroev|Evgeniy Tsyganov|Vladislav Abashin|Kseniya Kutepova|Olga Krasko|Pyotr Fyodorov|Konstantin Shelestun|Andrey Nazimov|Ramis Ibragimov|Garasim Vasilev|Oleg Shapkov|Konstantin Balakirev|Tamara Obutova|Oleg Sokolov|Viktor Zhalsanov|Dmitry Sharakois|Aleksandr Korshunov|Dmitriy Mulyar|Natalya Danilova|Vladimir Kachan|Evgeniy Titov|Aleksandr Kashcheyev
title: Territoriya
